attributes.action: Recommend a knighthood for Vernon Handley
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Vernon Handley is a conductor who has made an outstanding contribution to British musical life and has consistently championed British music. I recently saw him conduct a concert of British music at the Queen Elizabeth Hall. He is now an old man and I feel that he deserves the recognition that a knighthood would confer.
